se.ltu.android.demo
Class DemoGameThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      se.ltu.android.demo.DemoGameThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, AnimationListener
public class DemoGameThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements AnimationListener

A thread that updates the world based on input and sensor events. All kind of game states and logic should be placed here. Very heavy calculations should still be placed in a separate asynchronous task.

Version:
$Revision: 24 $
Author:
Ã…ke Svedin
